subject: AI & Agents
title: The Confusion Matrix: A Map of Mistakes
description: A quick, practical guide to The Confusion Matrix: A Map of Mistakes.

hook.text: Your model makes mistakes. The confusion matrix tells you exactly which mistakes and how often.

buildup.text: It's a table showing true positives, false positives, true negatives, and false negatives.

discovery.text: False positives: crying wolf. False negatives: missing the wolf. Both have different costs.

twist.text: In medicine, a false negative (missed disease) is far worse than a false positive (extra test).

climax.text: The confusion matrix is the foundation for precision, recall, F1, and every evaluation metric.

punchline.text: Know your mistakes by name, and you can fix them.

quiz.question: What is a false negative in a medical screening context?
options: A sick patient incorrectly classified as healthy
A healthy patient incorrectly classified as sick
